name: HeeHeeHaaHaa the Clown
description:
HeeHeeHaaHaa the clown is the most wanted digital clown in the entire universe, but he HATES being clicked, can you defeat him?

Using the bundled bounty poster, you can invoke him directly into your computer!

This game features a boss fight against a manic clown that's trying to shut down your computer, if you fail, he WILL shut down your computer, this disclaimer is put multiple times throught the application before it begins.

This was created as an experiment back in 2020, but I never felt like releasing it.

All it can do is keep your computer locked into the fight, change your wallpaper, stop your mouse in place, and shut down your computer if you fail to defeat him. There's nothing else to it.

An aspect ratio of 16:9 is recommended
